metadata.title: CVE-2020-16287 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
A buffer overflow vulnerability in lprn_is_black() incontrib/lips4/gdevlprn.c of Artifex Software GhostScript v9.50 allows aremote attacker to cause a denial of service via a crafted PDF file. Thisis fixed in v9.51.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-16287` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

ghostscript - 9.50~dfsg-5ubuntu4.2
ghostscript-x - 9.50~dfsg-5ubuntu4.2
libgs9 - 9.50~dfsg-5ubuntu4.2
libgs9-common - 9.50~dfsg-5ubuntu4.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ghostscript package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '9.50~dfsg-5ubuntu4.2').
